public class  GrapherPanel
     extends java.awt.Panel
     implements java.awt.event.MouseListener,

Summary  |  Top 
   public GrapherPanel(JotUI the_JotUI, 
                       Panel the_grapher, 
                       Panel panelDummy)

This constructor is called by applications to give them a panel for which a call to createImage() will succeed.
